project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement CSV file loading and parsing
Implement functionality to calculate mean for numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for numerical columns
Implement user input handling to specify the columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
